casebody.data:
No. 10-5019. Lonnie Joe Jackson, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1056, 131 S. Ct. 639,

178 L. Ed. 2d 471,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9191. November 29, 2010.

On petition for *472writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit for further consideration in light of Carr v. United States, 560 U.S. 438, 130 S. Ct. 2229, 176 L. Ed. 2d 1152 (2010).
